author: cskiraly
content:
Hi EL teams. As anticipated some time ago, we've created this el-networking channel to have a dedicated space to discuss ... guess what: el networking ðŸ™‚ . 
(original message at https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/688075293562503241/1405833836691980451)

Topics of interest that I'm aware of:

1) ** EL discovery,** improvements, improvement proposals, etc. (we have done a few changes recently in Geth and plan to do more ... maybe worth sharing experiences and syncing. there is also the question of discv5 vs discv4)

2) **devp2p improvements**: there have been new versions, but adaptation is still low.
There are also some new areas we are exploring:
- improving dial success rates: some type of peer filtering/scoring ... without risking network partitioning
- improving pull performance: extending announcements with sender address and nonce
- adding cell-level bitmaps and partial pull
- proposals to separate type3 tx from sidecar are also in the works


3)** mempool partial diffusion**: we have various sharding and partial diffusion related proposals in the pipeline. These are becoming increasingly important now that we start scaling mempool capacity agressively.
